submapp.som.Som.clear_map_info¶

Som.clear_map_info() → None¶

Clear all data related to the mapping phase

Data related to the mapping phase can help to understand the behavior of the trained SOM and to evaluate its quality. However if the SOM has been trained again after having already mapped some inputs it could be wise to delete previous map information stored in the SOM. Similarly, if the same input was mapped twice (or more) map info should be cleared and the mapping phase done again.

List of data cleared:

  • nb_inputs_mapped

  • distance_transitions

  • transition

  • relerr_test

  • occ_bmu_map

  • time_info

Return type

None
